title: OYO forays into sports hospitality business, shortlists 100 hotels in 12 key cities
description: OYO, a hospitality and travel-tech firm, has shortlisted 100 hotels across 12 key cities to cater to large sports events. The sports hospitality business aims to provide end-to-end solutions, including accommodation for athletes and sports officials. The company will offer a range of accommodation options, from budget-friendly to premium hotels, to ensure a comfortable stay for participants. Specialized packages and group booking options will be available.
